title: HOUR 3- Jim Boeheim Aug 31, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Jim Boeheim Aug 31, 2020
description:
Syracuse men's basketball coach Jim Boeheim stops in to help Dan celebrate the life of former Georgetown men's basketball coach John Thompson, who passed away Monday. Coach Boeheim also shares some strong opinions regarding Covid-19 and a return to college sports and college campuses. Also, NBA reporter Kyle Goon of the Southern California News Group joins the show to discuss the playoffs, LeBron and the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
